definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: This time we went to another side of Nam Sang Wai for sketching. This house is a small restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 今次到了另一个景写生，这个排屋是间茶餐厅。

sentences.english: This is the first time that the outbreak of demonstrations in cities and towns inhabited by Arabs.
sentences.chinese: 今次亦是首次有阿拉伯人聚居城镇爆发示威。

sentences.english: The next day, Grandmother brings Small Boy to the market to buy fish.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，阿婆又带粗眉仔去街市，今次系买鱼。

sentences.english: An incumbent Member of any District Council cannot be nominated at the by-election .
sentences.chinese: 现任区议员得在今次补选中接受提名。

sentences.english: Eric has a dancing background. Hence he will perform more dancing in the anniversary show.
sentences.chinese: 孙耀威跳舞底子不差，所以今次贺台庆特别加码演出。

sentences.english: Michael Gambon, another veteran of stage, screen and television, plays Lord Fox.
sentences.chinese: 老戏骨兼舞台和电视红人米高甘博今次扮演霍士爵士。

sentences.english: So this is a great opportunity to tailor-make a Beetle Cat Taxi all for myself!
sentences.chinese: 今次是个好机会，给自己度身订造一辆甲虫猫车了。

sentences.english: On good wear and come back to foshan, this time is to want to come back to the yuan.
sentences.chinese: 月好看穿翩翩今次回佛山来，是想回到一元身边。

Yuen Long town in northwest New Territories, Hong Kong
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
